member.summary: Gets and sets the value for the restriction information. If null is set, the value is transformed to String.Empty.

member.summary: Reads the configuration.

member.summary: Gets a list of values.

member.summary: Returns a string that contains the id of the child list of values to the given id of the parent list. If no childs are found an empty string is returned.

member.summary: Gets the number ob childs to the provided id of a list of values.

member.returns: The numer of childs. If no childs exist 0 is returned.

Name of the list of values.
member.returns: True if the list of values exists and the column is part of these list, otherwise false is returned.

member.name: T:de.pta.Component.ListOfValues.ILocalization
member.summary: Interface that provides language specific information. A client that uses the list of values, must implement this interface and provide so the necessary information.

remarks.pre: History Author: M.Keller, PTA GmbH Date: Sept/23/2003 Remarks: None

member.name: M:de.pta.Component.ListOfValues.ILocalization.GetLocalizedText(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a localized text. The implementation of the method must localize the text provided as parameter. Localization can be done by a localization manager or by a database and so on. If no localization is needed, the incoming text can only be returned.
member.returns: The localized text.

member.name: T:de.pta.Component.ListOfValues.LovItem
member.summary: Encapsulates an entry of a list of values.
member.remarks: This class is desiged to use outside the component. It is used to exchange data over the LovSingleton interface.

remarks.pre: History Author: M.Keller, PTA GmbH Date: Apr/02/2003 Remarks: None

member.name: M:de.pta.Component.ListOfValues.LovItem.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs the object.

member.name: M:de.pta.Component.ListOfValues.LovItem.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs the object with the given parameters.

member.name: P:de.pta.Component.ListOfValues.LovItem.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the id of the item.

member.name: P:de.pta.Component.ListOfValues.LovItem.IdAsLong
member.summary: Gets the id of the item as an long value (Read only). Throws an exception, when the id of the item is not numeric.

member.name: P:de.pta.Component.ListOfValues.LovItem.DecId
member.summary: Gets the id of the item as an decimal value (Read only). Throws an exception, when the id of the item is not numeric.

member.name: P:de.pta.Component.ListOfValues.LovItem.ItemValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the item.

member.name: M:de.pta.Component.ListOfValues.LovItem.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares the item value of the passed object with the item value of this object.
member.returns: Less than zero: this instance is less than obj. Zero: this instance is equal to obj. Greater than zero: this instance is greater than obj.
member.remarks: The implementation of the IComparable interface makes it possioble to use the ArrayList.Sort() method.

member.name: M:de.pta.Component.ListOfValues.LovSingleton.ReadConfiguration
member.summary: Invokes the reading of the configuration. Configuration can be read more than one times. But must be called at least once. However, if configuration must be reloaded you can call ReadConfiguration again.
